display_help: Use this power to give you a pop-up window which will explain your role as the Grifter. This power will remain with you throughout the Heist. Recharge: Very Fast
display_target_help: Use this power to give you a pop-up window which will explain your role as the Grifter. This power will remain with you throughout the Heist.
display_confirm: As the Grifter in the Heist of Tyrant's Palace, your first duty involves distracting Sylvia Rexson, personal assistant to Ted Dubois, chief of security. This will keep her out of the upstairs office, where the Thief will simultaneously be searching for objects crucial to your operation. Your second task will be to secure the voice-passphrase for the vault from Mr. Dubois himself, by coaxing him into saying key words that can be used to assemble the phrase. Your success will unlock the Vault for the Thief.
